com.percussion.utils.security
Class PSEncrypter

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.utils.security.PSEncrypter

public class PSEncrypter
extends Object

Utility class to encrypt and decrypt strings using the Blowfish cipher with a secret shared key.

Field Summary
static int BYTE_ARRAY_MULTIPLE
          The length of the byte array passed to the cipher encryption object for decryption in decrypt(String, String) must be a multiple of this value.
 
Method Summary
static String decrypt(String str, String key)
          Decrypts the provided string using the supplied secret key.
static String encrypt(String str, String key)
          Encrypts the provided string using the supplied secret key
static byte[] toByteArray(BigInteger bigInt)
          Converts a BigInteger to a byte array whose size is a multiple of BYTE_ARRAY_MULTIPLE.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Field Detail

BYTE_ARRAY_MULTIPLE

public static final int BYTE_ARRAY_MULTIPLE
The length of the byte array passed to the cipher encryption object for decryption in decrypt(String, String) must be a multiple of this value. Used in toByteArray(BigInteger).

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

encrypt

public static String encrypt(String str,
                             String key)
Encrypts the provided string using the supplied secret key

Parameters:
str - The string to encrypt, may not be null, may be empty.
key - The secret key to encrypt the string, may not be null or empty.
Returns:
The encrypted string, never null, may be empty.

decrypt

public static String decrypt(String str,
                             String key)
Decrypts the provided string using the supplied secret key.

Parameters:
str - The string to decrypt, may not be null, may be empty.
key - The secret key that was used to encrypt the string, may not be null or empty.
Returns:
The decrypted string, never null, may be empty.

toByteArray

public static byte[] toByteArray(BigInteger bigInt)
Converts a BigInteger to a byte array whose size is a multiple of BYTE_ARRAY_MULTIPLE. For positive values or a value of zero, the byte array is padded with leading 0 byte values if necessary. For negative values, the byte array is padded with leading -1 byte values if necessary.

Parameters:
bigInt - The BigInteger to convert, may not be null.
Returns:
A valid byte array form of a BigInteger with a size which is a multiple of BYTE_ARRAY_MULTIPLE.
